data.text: The Lord created man of the earth,
He gave them days by number, and a set time,
He endued them with strength proper to them;
He put the fear of Gr. him.  man upon all flesh,
Verse 5 is omitted by the best authorities.
Counsel, and tongue, and eyes,
He filled them with the knowledge of wisdom,
He set his eye upon their hearts,
Verse 9 is omitted by the best authorities.
And they shall praise the name of his  holiness,
He added unto them knowledge,
He made an everlasting covenant with them,
Their eyes saw the majesty of his  glory;
And he said unto them, Beware of all unrighteousness;
Their ways are ever before him;
Verses 16, 18, and 21 are omitted by the best authorities.
For every nation he appointed a ruler;
Verses 16, 18, and 21 are omitted by the best authorities.
All their works are as the sun before him;
Their iniquities are not hid from him;
Verses 16, 18, and 21 are omitted by the best authorities.
With him the alms of a man is as a signet;
Afterwards he will rise up and recompense them,
Howbeit unto them that repent he granteth a return;
Return unto the Lord, and forsake sins:
Turn again to the Most High, and turn away from iniquity; A line is here omitted by the best authorities.
Who shall give praise to the Most High in Gr. Hades.  the grave,
Thanksgiving perisheth from the dead, as from one that is not:
How great is the mercy of the Lord,
For all things cannot be in men,
What is brighter than the sun? yet this faileth:
He looketh upon the power of the height of heaven:
